blocks.content: Closure of the binary operation of a magma with identity. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 16-Jun-2011.)

thm exidcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cin(cmagm, cexid)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(co(c1, c0, c3), c2))

} = {

  3impb(wcel(c0, cin(cmagm, cexid)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(co(c1, c0, c3), cdm(cdm(c0))))
  sylbi(wa(wcel(c0, cin(cmagm, cexid)), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))), wcel(co(c1, c0, c3), cdm(cdm(c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cin(cmagm, cexid)), wa(wcel(c1, cdm(cdm(c0))), wcel(c3, cdm(cdm(c0))))))
  pm5.32i(wcel(c0, cin(cmagm, cexid)), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, cdm(cdm(c0))), wcel(c3, cdm(cdm(c0)))))
  anbi12d(wcel(c0, cin(cmagm, cexid)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, cdm(cdm(c0))), wcel(c3, cdm(cdm(c0))))
  eleq2d(c1, c2, cdm(cdm(c0)), wcel(c0, cin(cmagm, cexid)))
  eleq2d(c3, c2, cdm(cdm(c0)), wcel(c0, cin(cmagm, cexid)))
  3expb(wcel(c0, cin(cmagm, cexid)), wcel(c1, cdm(cdm(c0))), wcel(c3, cdm(cdm(c0))), wcel(co(c1, c0, c3), cdm(cdm(c0))))
  syl3an1(wcel(c0, cin(cmagm, cexid)), wcel(c1, cdm(cdm(c0))), wcel(c3, cdm(cdm(c0))), wcel(co(c1, c0, c3), cdm(cdm(c0))), wcel(c0, cmagm))

  3eqtr3d(((c1[c0]c3)[c6](c4[c0]c5)), ((c1[c6]c4)[c0](c3[c6]c5)), (((c1[c0]c3)[c6]c4)[c6]c5), (((c1[c6]c4)[c0]c3)[c6]c5), (c0 ‚àà AbelOp ‚àß((c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2))))

blocks.name: grpoeqdivid
blocks.content: Two group elements are equal iff their quotient is the identity. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 6-Jan-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpoeqdivid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wb(wceq(c1, c3), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c5)))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cgi, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cgs, c0))
} = {
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c1, c3), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c5))
  syl5ibrcom(w3a(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c1, c3), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c5), wceq(co(c3, c4, c3), c5))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(co(c3, c4, c3), c5))
  grpodivid(c0, c3, c2, c4, c5)
  eqeq1d(co(c1, c4, c3), c5, co(c3, c4, c3), wceq(c1, c3))
  oveq1(c1, c3, c4, c3)
  syl5ib(w3a(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c5), wceq(c1, c3), wceq(co(co(c1, c4, c3), c0, c3), co(c5, c0, c3)))
  oveq1(co(c1, c4, c3), c5, c0, c3)
  eqeq12d(co(co(c1, c4, c3), c0, c3), co(c5, c0, c3), c1, c3, w3a(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  grponpcan(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(co(c5, c0, c3), c3))
  grpolid(c0, c3, c2, c5)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c1 = c3 ‚Üî(c1[c4]c3)= c5))
